hero.tagline: Hand-picked experiences by our studio team
hero.omiseDescription: Seamless booking and payments with Money Space and shared SchemaDB — works with LINE LIFF login and real-time access control.

cart.title: Shopping cart
cart.subtitle: Unpaid or pending bookings you can resume
cart.emptyHint: Orders you created but haven't paid for yet will stay here until you finish checkout.
cart.loginRequired: Please sign in with LINE to see your cart.

checkout.title: Checkout & payment
checkout.subtitle: Fill in your name and phone before paying.
checkout.subtitleLive: Money Space gateway is connected. Please confirm your details and choose QR or card.
checkout.stepInfoDesc: Confirm learner profile before moving forward.
checkout.stepPaymentDesc: Choose how you want to pay via Money Space.
checkout.stepPayDesc: Review details then start the payment session.
checkout.stepRedirectDesc: Complete the redirect or scan the QR to finish.
checkout.contactHint: We use this to confirm bookings and send reminders via Line and SMS.
checkout.notePlaceholder: Allergic to nuts, prefer front row, need parking...
checkout.paymentHint: Bank transfer is available now while Money Space card payments are being wired up.
checkout.paymentHintLive: Pay securely via Money Space (QR code or card).
checkout.terms: By proceeding you agree to our studio terms.
checkout.intentCreatedHint: If you are not redirected automatically, tap pay again.
checkout.qrSubtitle: Scan with your banking app or mobile camera, then confirm in Money Space.
checkout.qrFallback: If the QR does not load, open the payment link instead.
checkout.qrDownloadError: We couldn't download the QR image. Please use the open link instead.
checkout.summaryHint: Seat, access count, and learner name
checkout.resultPlaceholder: Start payment to see Money Space status here.
checkout.errorPayment: Unable to create payment session, please try again.
checkout.loginRequired: Please sign in with LINE to continue

myCourses.title: My courses
myCourses.subtitle: Access passes and bookings tied to your LINE account
myCourses.homeSubtitle: Track payments, seats, and recorded classes in one place
myCourses.homeHint: Tap to view passes you already bought or pending payments.
myCourses.loginHint: We need your LINE account to fetch your bookings.
myCourses.expiryPending: Countdown starts when you scan to join. 30-day access per first scan.
myCourses.expiryHint: Countdown begins after your first check-in (30 days)

payment.redirectReminder: Please wait while we confirm your payment with Money Space.
payment.verificationError: We could not verify this payment. Please contact support.
payment.headline: Thank you for your payment
payment.subheadline: We will confirm your seat and update your access shortly.
payment.summarySubtitle: Keep this summary for your records.

message.success: We received your payment. Your seat will be confirmed shortly.
message.fail: We could not confirm this payment. Please retry or contact support.
message.cancel: You cancelled the payment. You can try again anytime.

nextSteps: Your seat and access will appear under "My courses" shortly.
Keep this receipt reference if you need to contact support.
You can browse more courses while we finalize your booking.
